thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Product Manager - Growth - Sports Management

title: Product Manager - Growth - Sports Management
text: Posted/Updated: 10-13-2015 Brief Job Description: This is a key role responsible for driving core metrics through creative optimization and feature development.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
